aiDescription: This skill enables Claude to create, edit, and analyze Microsoft Word documents programmatically. It supports tracked changes, comments, and complex formatting while preserving document structure. Part of Anthropic's official document skills powering Claude's file creation capabilities.
seoContent:
## What is the DOCX Skill?

The DOCX skill empowers Claude Code to work seamlessly with Microsoft Word documents, providing comprehensive document creation, editing, and analysis capabilities. This official Anthropic skill enables AI-powered document automation for professional workflows.

## Key Features

- Create new Word documents from scratch with full formatting control
- Edit existing documents while preserving styles, headers, and footers
- Track changes and manage revisions programmatically
- Insert and format tables, images, and complex layouts
- Handle comments and annotations for collaborative editing
- Support for document templates and style management

## Use Cases

- **Automated Report Generation**: Generate professional reports with consistent branding and formatting from data sources
- **Document Templating**: Create reusable document templates for contracts, proposals, and forms
- **Batch Processing**: Process multiple documents simultaneously for formatting updates or content extraction
- **Content Migration**: Convert content between formats while maintaining document integrity

## How to Get Started

Install the DOCX skill to your Claude Code environment and start creating documents immediately. The skill integrates with Python's document processing libraries and provides intuitive commands for common operations.

## Why Use This Skill?

The DOCX skill eliminates manual document creation tedium and ensures consistency across all your Word documents. Whether you're generating reports, creating proposals, or processing forms, this skill transforms hours of work into automated workflows that run in seconds.

aiDescription: A comprehensive PDF toolkit that allows Claude to extract text and tables, create new PDFs, merge and split documents, and handle form fields. This production-grade skill powers Claude's PDF capabilities and demonstrates advanced document manipulation patterns.
seoContent:
## What is the PDF Skill?

The PDF skill provides Claude Code with a complete toolkit for working with PDF documents. From text extraction to document creation, merging, splitting, and form handling, this skill covers every aspect of PDF manipulation needed in modern workflows.

## Key Features

- Extract text, tables, and structured data from PDF files
- Create new PDF documents with custom layouts and formatting
- Merge multiple PDFs into single documents
- Split large PDFs into smaller, focused files
- Fill and process PDF form fields programmatically
- Add watermarks, headers, and page numbers

## Use Cases

- **Invoice Processing**: Extract data from invoices for accounting automation
- **Document Assembly**: Combine multiple PDFs into comprehensive packages
- **Form Automation**: Pre-fill forms with data from databases or spreadsheets
- **Report Distribution**: Generate and prepare PDFs for automated distribution

## How to Get Started

Install the PDF skill and begin processing documents immediately. The skill handles common PDF operations through simple commands, making complex document workflows accessible without deep PDF library knowledge.

## Why Use This Skill?

PDFs are everywhere in business workflows, and manual processing is time-consuming and error-prone. The PDF skill automates these tasks with precision, enabling you to process hundreds of documents in the time it would take to handle one manually. This skill is essential for any workflow involving document automation.

aiDescription: Enables Claude to create, edit, and analyze PowerPoint presentations with support for layouts, templates, charts, and automated slide generation. This skill handles complex presentation structures including master slides, animations, and embedded content.
seoContent:
## What is the PPTX Skill?

The PPTX skill enables Claude Code to create, modify, and analyze PowerPoint presentations programmatically. Build professional slide decks, apply templates, insert charts, and automate presentation generation for consistent, high-quality output.

## Key Features

- Create presentations from scratch with custom themes
- Apply and modify master slide templates
- Insert charts, tables, and data visualizations
- Add and format images, shapes, and SmartArt
- Generate slides dynamically from data sources
- Support for speaker notes and animations

## Use Cases

- **Sales Decks**: Generate customized sales presentations from CRM data
- **Monthly Reports**: Automate recurring presentation updates with fresh data
- **Training Materials**: Create consistent training content at scale
- **Data Presentations**: Transform data into visual presentation formats automatically

## How to Get Started

Install the PPTX skill to start creating presentations. The skill provides intuitive commands for slide operations, layout management, and content insertion, making presentation automation straightforward.

## Why Use This Skill?

Creating presentations manually is repetitive and time-consuming. The PPTX skill lets you generate polished presentations in seconds, maintain brand consistency across all decks, and update content automatically when source data changes. Transform your presentation workflow from hours to minutes.

aiDescription: Provides Claude with Excel spreadsheet capabilities including formula creation, cell formatting, data analysis, and visualization generation. Supports complex workbook structures with multiple sheets, pivot tables, and conditional formatting.
seoContent:
## What is the XLSX Skill?

The XLSX skill gives Claude Code comprehensive Excel spreadsheet capabilities. Create, edit, and analyze spreadsheets with formulas, formatting, charts, and data analysis features that match Excel's native functionality.

## Key Features

- Create and modify Excel workbooks with multiple sheets

- Apply cell formatting, styles, and conditional formatting
- Generate charts and data visualizations
- Work with pivot tables and data analysis tools
- Handle large datasets efficiently

## Use Cases

- **Financial Modeling**: Build and update financial models automatically
- **Data Transformation**: Process and transform data between formats

## How to Get Started

Install the XLSX skill to begin working with Excel files immediately. The skill supports both reading existing files and creating new spreadsheets from scratch with full formatting control.

## Why Use This Skill?

Excel remains the backbone of business data processing, but manual spreadsheet work is tedious and error-prone. The XLSX skill automates these tasks, ensuring accuracy and consistency while dramatically reducing the time needed for spreadsheet operations. Essential for any data-driven workflow.

aiDescription: Teaches Claude to generate creative algorithmic art using p5.js for generative and procedural designs. Enables creation of patterns, fractals, particle systems, and interactive visualizations with mathematical precision.

- Create particle systems and flow fields
- Build procedural textures and backgrounds
- Design interactive visualizations
- Implement noise-based generative techniques
- Export artwork in various formats

## Use Cases

- **Digital Art Creation**: Generate unique algorithmic artworks for projects
- **Background Generation**: Create procedural backgrounds for websites and apps

- **Educational Visualizations**: Demonstrate mathematical concepts through art

## How to Get Started

Install the Algorithmic Art skill and start creating generative designs immediately. The skill provides templates and patterns for common generative techniques, making it easy to create professional-quality art.

## Why Use This Skill?

Algorithmic art combines creativity with code, producing unique visuals that would be impossible to create manually. This skill democratizes generative art, enabling anyone to create stunning procedural designs without deep programming knowledge. Perfect for creative projects, backgrounds, and visual experiments.

Perfect for teams needing consistent graphics without dedicated design resources.

aiDescription: Specialized skill for creating animated GIFs optimized for Slack's size constraints and messaging context. Handles frame generation, optimization, and ensures compatibility with Slack's image processing.

This skill handles optimization automatically, ensuring your animations look great and load quickly in Slack. Make your team communications more engaging and memorable.

aiDescription: Test local web applications using Playwright for UI verification and debugging. Supports automated testing, visual regression, and interactive debugging of web applications during development.

aiDescription: A complete software development workflow with 20+ battle-tested skills. Features spec-driven design, subagent-driven development, strict TDD enforcement, and systematic debugging. Agents work autonomously for hours following approved plans with mandatory code review.

## Why Use This Skill?

aiDescription: Expert guidance for ffuf web fuzzing during penetration testing and security assessments. Covers wordlist selection, parameter fuzzing, and result analysis for security professionals.

ffuf is powerful but requires expertise for effective use. This skill provides the knowledge to conduct thorough, efficient fuzzing campaigns. Essential for security professionals performing authorized testing.

aiDescription: Advanced context techniques with minimal token footprint for efficient prompting. Provides patterns for managing context windows effectively and reducing token usage.

- Token optimization patterns

- Memory-efficient prompting

## Use Cases

- **Token Optimization**: Reduce costs through efficient context use
- **Long Conversations**: Maintain context across extended sessions

- **Prompt Engineering**: Design efficient, effective prompts

## How to Get Started

Install the Context Engineering Kit to improve context efficiency. The kit provides patterns and techniques for various context management scenarios.

## Why Use This Skill?

Context window limits constrain what LLMs can process. This kit provides techniques to make the most of available context, enabling more complex tasks while controlling token costs.
